entry.title: Wednesday: Light snow. Temperature steady near minus 13.
entry.summary: Light snow ending this morning then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Clearing this afternoon. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light late this afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 13. Wind chill near minus 24. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CST Wednesday 15 February 2023
